column6: My steadfast go to for years.
column9: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2021
column14: Have been using CG Outlast for years with various colors. Always Rosy is my favorite.  They stay on well, and leave some residual color even after eating. None of this class of long wear lip color lasts as long as they say, but these are affordable, long lasting (both in longevity of the tube as well as the color), and flattering. I’m 69 yo and have no lip “bleeding” with them. Great range of colors, too.

column6: Color true to picture. Stays on well
column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2021
column14: I use the pool at the gym 6 days a week. I was looking for something that was essentially waterproof. This lip color is good at keeping the color throughout 2 hour sessions in the pool, steam room, and jacuzzi. There are two components: the lip stain and the gloss overcoat. The lip stain stays on like a boss. The gloss part needs reapplication after swimming ( big deal). All on all, I recommend this product. The price was reasonable too.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2021
column14: It’s all I’ve been using for lipstick since the mask mandate for Covid. It goes on wet and then dries so it doesn’t smear or rub off. It’s like a lip stain. Coat it with the clear gloss that comes with it for moisture. Stays on pretty much all day. You may need a touch up after eating or just add more gloss. I love the “wine to five” shade product no. 538.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2021
column14: This lipstick got 3 stars instead of 5 only because it’s a dark intense color and I can’t wear those colors.  In general, I love these lipsticks, but they are not moisturizing.  They stay on until you take them off unless you eat something greasy or oily.  I no longer wear any other lipstick but these.  The shipment arrived on time and was nicely packaged.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2021
column14: This All-Day Lip Color with moisturizing topcoat holds up to its true product description. I bought this last minute hoping the shade and all day wear holds true and it definitely does. It is light weight, not heavy so it's a comfortable feel. The color is a matt silvery grape that stays forever until it's washed off with soap and water. The moisturizing topcoat was needed to keep lips moist with a sheen shine. Overall, this is a Good Product for those who are looking for this color and long wear. It came next day delivery, packaged very well. I recommend this product!

column6: I Have used Covergrl lipstick for a long time.
column9: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2021
column14: I like the idea that I can put it on in the morning and it will be there all day, however, I seem to have a problem getting the right shade. This one was mauve/rose and it was more mauve than rose which made it to light for me. The color on the package is close but not exact.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2021
column14: I love this and with the clear moisturing topcoat my lips never feel dried out or uncomfortable.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2021
column14: I've been looking for long-lasting lip color for ages.  Most last a while but stain my cups.  My daughter turned me on to these and they are great.  I mix colors to give dimension to my lips, one application lasts all day and there are no staining cups, it lasts through lunch!  I might need a little touch-up for the evening.
